f_enable_transport../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_enable_transportenable_transport -- Activate pick/drag and drop mechanism. do ../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_is_transport_enabledis_transport_enabled := True if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp as l_parent_imp then l_parent_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_list_imp.xml#f_update_pnd_connectionupdate_pnd_connection (True) end end

f_able_to_transport../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_able_to_transportable_to_transport (a_button: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current able to initiate transport with a_button. do Result := (../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_mode_is_drag_and_dropmode_is_drag_and_drop and then a_button = 1) or (../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_mode_is_pick_and_dropmode_is_pick_and_drop and then a_button = 3 and then not ../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_mode_is_configurable_target_menumode_is_configurable_target_menu) end

f_draw_rubber_band../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_draw_rubber_banddraw_rubber_band -- Erase previously drawn rubber band. -- Draw a rubber band between initial pick point and cursor. do check do_not_call: False end end
f_erase_rubber_band../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_erase_rubber_banderase_rubber_band -- Erase previously drawn rubber band. do check do_not_call: False end end

f_is_selected../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is the item selected. do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp as l_parent_imp then Result := l_parent_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_list_imp.xml#f_selected_itemsselected_items.Falsehas (../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface) end end

f_x_position../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_x_positionx_position: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Horizontal offset relative to parent ../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_x_positionx_position in pixels. local l_h_adjust: FalsePOINTER l_parent_imp: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp l_list_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_list_imp.xmlEV_LIST_IMP do l_parent_imp := ../implementation_gtk/ev_list_item_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp if l_parent_imp /= Void then l_list_imp ?= l_parent_imp if l_list_imp /= Void then l_h_adjust := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_scrolled_window_get_hadjustmentgtk_scrolled_window_get_hadjustment (l_list_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_list_imp.xml#f_scrollable_areascrollable_area) if l_h_adjust /= Falsedefault_pointer then Result := - {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_adjustment_struct_valuegtk_adjustment_struct_value (l_h_adjust).Falserounded end end end end
